name: Yahtcee
overview: Yahtcee is a computer adaptation of the famous dice game. In this adaptation, the players get to roll five dice and you get to re-roll any number of them up to two times in order to make a nice set. Sets include ones through sixes, three of a kind, four of kind, full house, small and large straight, Yahtzee (five of a kind) and chance. If the ones through sixes add up to more than three time each of those numbers the player receives a bonus. The game can be played with up to four players throwing dice in turns.
